messages.message:
As mentioned in team meetings, we are sending an offer to Vaibhav (https://www.linkedin.com/in/vaibhavyadaram/) (<mailto:yadaram.vaibhav@gmail.com|yadaram.vaibhav@gmail.com>) for a frontend engineering position - please send a congrats email to them, esp if you interviewed him! (cc @Weiming Wu @Paul H)

He was referred by Udit, and if he joins, he will be going to the NYC office :blob_excited:
